MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH46 area of Wirral affecting properties in Alwyn Gardens and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an underground cable and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:06am on 9th February 2021.
